data.message: you're the usual fuckin dickhead u are bro, drop the fucking news on the album, we're starving for your shit, move your ass, peace <3

replies.message: if you a true fan you'd be patient.

The both of you are the worst types of fans. The one moaning non stop and the one blowing him. Jesus.
Cant rush art and if you do, quality suffers.

no ones blowing him you autistic fuck😂😂😂.   anyone deserves to boast a lil bit if they came poor to rich.    i wasn't just taking about him i was talking about all the people who started from nothing in general.   so before you call people out on shit... you might wanna sit and AT LEAST try to think.  (which is probably hard for you) and think about what people are talking about.

"dear slim, I wrote you but you still ain't callin" "i promise I wasn't talking about him I was talking about everyone who struggled to success, honest." It seems like you like him more than you let on. I've struck a nerve. You'd pay to smell his toilet, be honest.
And the Chicago cubs are piss weak. The giants are better.
Guys chill we got 2018 for the album he's not done yet
